name: The Gift (itch) (JOxley)
description:
Your name is Gyro. You've awoken in a dungeon shortly after being sentenced to life in prison for trying to revolt against the Queen. But a mysterious voice speaks to you from beyond the abyss. Claiming to be God. He endows you with the power of Absolute Nullification, the power to set any action to zero.

But the real story is what you do with the power. Do you end the Queens tyrannous reign on your country? Or maybe you'll are exiled from the country to far east?

That's all up to you.

FEATURES: 

6 Good Endings

17 Bad Endings

Tracking How You Play
